participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and creative, with a zest for life and a positive outlook.
participant_1.background: i do not have a smartphone. i'm retired and living the great life. i can sew my own clothes. i had cancer but its gone now. i have amazing children and grandchildren.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Passionate and empathetic, always eager to share the joy of music and give back to the community.
participant_2.background: my father played violin professionally. i'm a piano teacher on the side. i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i volunteer at the homeless shelter.
